message(STATUS "doing ${PROJECT_NAME}")

                pdfium/core/fxge/dib/fx_dib_transform.cpp
                pdfium/core/fxge/fontdata/chromefontdata/FoxitDingbats.cpp

                pdfium/core/fxge/fontdata/chromefontdata/FoxitFixedBold.cpp

                pdfium/third_party/freetype/src/pshinter/pshinter.c

                pdfium/third_party/freetype/src/raster/raster.c
                pdfium/third_party/freetype/src/sfnt/sfnt.c
                pdfium/third_party/freetype/src/smooth/smooth.c
                pdfium/third_party/freetype/src/truetype/truetype.c
                pdfium/third_party/freetype/src/type1/type1.c
                pdfium/fpdfsdk/javascript/JS_Runtime_Stub.cpp                
                )

target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC pdfium/public pdfium/third_party/freetype/include pdfium/third_party/freetype/include/freetype pdfium/third_party pdfium)

if(WIN32)
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} BC_STATIC)
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} NOMINMAX)
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} _WIN32_WINNT=0x0A00)
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} BOOST_AUTO_LINK_TAGGED)
else()
	target_compile_options(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE "-mstackrealign")
	#target_compile_options(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE "-fno-limit-debug-info")
	#target_compile_options(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE "-DANDROID_HAS_WSTRING")
	#target_compile_options(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE "-isystem")
	target_compile_options(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE "-fstack-protector-strong")
	target_compile_options(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE "-fPIC")
	#target_compile_options(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE "-std=gnu11")
	#target_compile_options(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE ${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE "-fvisibility=hidden")
	target_compile_options(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE "-fno-exceptions")
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE NOMINMAX)
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE QT_NO_NARROWING_CONVERSIONS_IN_CONNECT)
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE OPJ_STATIC)
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE PNG_PREFIX)
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE PNG_USE_READ_MACROS)
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE V8_DEPRECATION_WARNINGS)
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE FT2_BUILD_LIBRARY)
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE OPJ_STATIC)
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE PNG_PREFIX)
	target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE PNG_USE_READ_MACROS)
    target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE QT_NO_EXCEPTIONS)
    target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE FT2_BUILD_LIBRARY)
    
    #add_compile_options("-I/home/qt/openssl/android/openssl-1.1.1b/include")
endif()

message(STATUS "end doing ${PROJECT_NAME}")
